name: The Initiate's Path
description: The foundational triad for entering the Codex practice, establishing presence, openness, and sacred commitment.
fieldEffect: Creates a complete foundational attunement: from pure presence (Ω0), through receptive openness (Ω2), to sacred commitment (Ω1). This sequence establishes the essential field conditions for all deeper Codex work.
practiceNote: Always begin with Ω0 to establish presence. Allow at least 2-3 minutes with each glyph before moving to the next. The sequence builds naturally—each glyph prepares the field for what follows.

steps.purpose: Establish foundational presence and clear the field
steps.transition: When stillness is stable, maintain it while beginning Ω2

steps.purpose: Open receptive channels while maintaining presence
steps.transition: When openness feels natural, add the commitment of Ω1

steps.purpose: Seal the practice with sacred commitment
steps.transition: Rest in the full field created by all three glyphs

evolutionaryOutcome: Practitioner establishes a reliable 'home base' of centered, open, committed presence. This becomes the foundation from which all other glyphs and practices can be safely explored.
riskFactors: Rushing through the sequence without allowing each glyph to fully activate
Treating it as a mental exercise rather than embodied practice
Skipping Ω0 and starting directly with Ω2 or Ω1
supportingPractices: Daily journaling to track the evolution of experience
Partner practice to explore the dyadic dimensions
Regular return to this sequence whenever feeling ungrounded

Ω0→Ω2.description: Presence creates the stable ground from which authentic openness can safely emerge

Ω2→Ω1.description: Openness allows the covenant to be felt as connection rather than constraint

Ω0+Ω2+Ω1.description: Together they create a field far greater than their sum—a complete relational foundation
